statements: DELETE FROM in_game_store WHERE player_id = '98765432-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND item_name = 'Sword';
DELETE FROM in_game_store WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM in_game_store WHERE item_price > 50 AND currency = 'USD';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM inventory WHERE currency_amount < 100);
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 1 AND item_id = 100;
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 2 AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM PlayerInventory WHERE player_id = 10 AND item_id = 5;
